Info: Wicked Blow Always results in a critical hit and ignores stat changes.

Name: Surging Strikes
Info: Surging Strikes Always results in a critical hit and ignores stat changes.

Name: Thunder Cage
Info: Thunder Cage Deals damage and traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

Name: Dragon Energy
Info: Dragon Energy The higher the user's HP, the higher the power.

Name: Freezing Glare
Info: Freezing Glare May freeze opponent. (10% chance)

Name: Fiery Wrath
Info: Fiery Wrath May cause flinching. (20% chance)

Name: Thunderous Kick
Info: Thunderous Kick Lowers opponent's Defense. (100% chance)

Name: Glacial Lance
Info: Glacial Lance The user attacks by hurling a blizzard-cloaked icicle lance at opposing Pokémon.

Name: Astral Barrage
Info: Astral Barrage The user attacks by sending a frightful amount of small ghosts at opposing Pokémon.

Name: Eerie Spell
Info: Eerie Spell deals damage and reduces the PP of the target's last-used move by 3.

Name: Dire Claw
Info: Dire Claw The user lashes out at the target with ruinous claws, aiming to land a critical hit. This may also leave the target poisoned, paralyzed, or drowsy.

Name: Psyshield Bash
Info: Psyshield Bash Cloaking itself in psychic energy, the user slams into the target. This may also raise the user’s defensive stats.

Name: Power Shift
Info: Power Shift switches the user's Attack stat with its Defense, and its Special Attack with Special Defense.

Name: Stone Axe
Info: Stone Axe The user swings its stone axes at the target, aiming to land a critical hit. Stone splinters left behind by this attack continue to damage the target for several turns.

Name: Springtide Storm
Info: Springtide Storm deals damage. If Enamorous is in Incarnate Forme, it also boosts its Attack and Defense; if the Enamorous is in Therian Forme, it lowers the target's Attack and Defense.

Name: Mystical Power
Info: Mystical Power deals damage, then raises the user's Attack and Special Attack if those stats are higher, or raises Defense and Special Defense if those stats are higher.

Name: Raging Fury
Info: Raging Fury The user rampages and spews vicious flames to inflict damage on the target, then becomes fixated on using this move.

Name: Wave Crash
Info: Wave Crash The user shrouds itself in water and slams into the target with its whole body to inflict damage. This also damages the user and raises the user’s action speed.

Name: Chloroblast
Info: Chloroblast The user launches its amassed chlorophyll to inflict damage on the target. This also damages the user and lowers the user’s action speed.

Name: Mountain Gale
Info: Mountain Gale The user hurls giant chunks of ice at the target to inflict damage. Lowers user's Speed.

Name: Victory Dance
Info: Victory Dance The user performs a dance to usher in victory. This raises the user’s offensive and defensive stats and increases the damage dealt by the user’s moves by 50 percent.

Name: Headlong Rush
Info: Headlong Rush The user smashes into the target in a full-body tackle. This also lowers the user’s defensive stats.

Name: Barb Barrage
Info: Barb Barrage The user launches countless toxic barbs to inflict damage. This may also poison the target. This move’s power is doubled if the target has a status condition.

Name: Esper Wing
Info: Esper Wing The user slashes the target with aura-enriched wings. This also raises the user’s action speed. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

Name: Bitter Malice
Info: Bitter Malice The user attacks its target with spine-chilling resentment. This may also leave the target with frostbite. This move’s power is doubled if the target has a status condition.

Name: Shelter
Info: Shelter The user makes its skin as hard as an iron shield, raising its defensive stats. Incoming moves also become more likely to miss.

Name: Triple Arrows
Info: Triple Arrows The user delivers an axe kick, then fires three arrows. This raises the chance of its future attacks landing critical hits and also lowers the target’s defensive stats.

Name: Infernal Parade
Info: Infernal Parade The user attacks with myriad fireballs. This may also leave the target with a burn. This move’s power is doubled if the target has a status condition.

Name: Ceaseless Edge
Info: Ceaseless Edge The user slashes its shell blade at the target, aiming to land a critical hit. Shell splinters left behind by this attack will continue to damage the target for several turns.

Name: Bleakwind Storm
Info: Bleakwind Storm The user attacks with savagely cold winds that cause both body and spirit to tremble. This may also leave the target with frostbite.

Name: Wildbolt Storm
Info: Wildbolt Storm The user summons a thunderous tempest and savagely attacks with lightning and wind. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Name: Sandsear Storm
Info: Sandsear Storm The user attacks by wrapping the target in fierce winds and searingly hot sand. This also leaves the target with a burn.

Name: Lunar Blessing
Info: Lunar Blessing The user heals its own status conditions and restores its HP. Incoming moves also become more likely to miss.

Name: Take Heart
Info: Take Heart The user lifts its spirits, healing its own status conditions and raising its offensive and defensive stats.

Name: Tera Blast
Info: Tera Blast deals damage, and its type changes to the user's Tera Type, when the Pokémon is Terastallized.

Name: Silk Trap
Info: Silk Trap Protects the user and lowers opponent's Speed on contact.

Name: Axe Kick
Info: Axe Kick May confuse opponent. If it misses, the user loses HP.

Name: Last Respects
Info: Last Respects Damages increases the more party Pokémon have been defeated.

Name: Lumina Crash
Info: Lumina Crash Harshly lowers target’s Special Defense.

Name: Order Up
Info: Order Up Order Up has no added effects.

Name: Jet Punch
Info: Jet Punch Always goes first.

Name: Spicy Extract
Info: Spicy Extract Harshly lowers the opponent's Defense and sharply raises their Attack.

Name: Spin Out
Info: Spin Out Harshly lowers user’s Speed.

Name: Population Bomb
Info: Population Bomb Hits 1-10 times in a row.

Name: Ice Spinner
Info: Ice Spinner Removes effects of Terrain.

Name: Glaive Rush
Info: Glaive Rush Attacks from opposing Pokémon during the next turn cannot miss and will inflict double damage.

Name: Revival Blessing
Info: Revival Blessing Revives a fainted party Pokémon to half HP.

Name: Salt Cure
Info: Salt Cure Deals damage each turn; Steel and Water types are more affected.

Name: Triple Dive
Info: Triple Dive Hits 3 times in a row.

Name: Mortal Spin
Info: Mortal Spin Removes entry hazards and trap move effects, and poisons opposing Pokémon.

Name: Doodle
Info: Doodle Changes the abilities of the user and its teammates to that of the target.

Name: Fillet Away
Info: Fillet Away Lowers HP but sharply boosts Attack, Special Attack, and Speed.

Name: Kowtow Cleave
Info: Kowtow Cleave Always hits.

Name: Flower Trick
Info: Flower Trick Never misses; always results in a critical hit.

Name: Torch Song
Info: Torch Song Raises user's Special Attack.

Name: Aqua Step
Info: Aqua Step Raises user's Speed. (100% chance)

Name: Raging Bull
Info: Raging Bull Type depends on the user’s form. Breaks through Reflect and Light Screen barriers.

Name: Make It Rain
Info: Make It Rain Lowers user's Special Attack. Money is earned after the battle.

Name: Ruination
Info: Ruination Halves the opponent's HP.

Name: Collision Course
Info: Collision Course Boosted even more if it's super-effective.

Name: Electro Drift
Info: Electro Drift Boosted even more if it's super-effective.

Name: Shed Tail
Info: Shed Tail Creates a substitute, then swaps places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

Name: Chilly Reception
Info: Chilly Reception Switches out and summons a snowstorm lasting 5 turns.

Name: Tidy Up
Info: Tidy Up Removes the effects of entry hazards and Substitute, and boosts user’s Attack and Speed.

Name: Snowscape
Info: Snowscape Raises Defense of Ice types for 5 turns.

Name: Pounce
Info: Pounce Lowers opponent's Speed. (100% chance)

Name: Trailblaze
Info: Trailblaze deals damage and raises the user's speed by one stage.

Name: Chilling Water
Info: Chilling Water Lowers opponent's Attack.

Name: Hyper Drill
Info: Hyper Drill Can strike through Protect/Detect.

Name: Twin Beam
Info: Twin Beam Hits twice in one turn.

Name: Rage Fist
Info: Rage Fist The more times the user has been hit by attacks, the greater the move's power.

Name: Armor Cannon
Info: Armor Cannon deals damage, but lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense stats.

Name: Bitter Blade
Info: Bitter Blade deals damage and the user will recover 50% of the damage taken by the target.

Name: Double Shock
Info: Double Shock After using this move, the user will no longer be Electric type.

Name: Gigaton Hammer
Info: Gigaton Hammer Cannot be used twice in a row.

Name: Comeuppance
Info: Comeuppance Deals more damage to the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

Name: Aqua Cutter
Info: Aqua Cutter deals damage and has an increased critical-hit ratio.

Name: Blazing Torque
Info: Blazing Torque Blazing Torque has no added effects.

Name: Wicked Torque
Info: Wicked Torque Wicked Torque has no added effects.

Name: Noxious Torque
Info: Noxious Torque Noxious Torque has no added effects.

Name: Combat Torque
Info: Combat Torque Combat Torque has no added effects.

Name: Magical Torque
Info: Magical Torque Magical Torque has no added effects.
